Articles.Content: Just reporting a bug in the new release, the "Snap Angle" reverts back to the "round" (no-snap) option every time I reload the game. This used to save the selection across multiple sessions.

Hmm. Are you using any mods or is this all stock?

Also, I would say make sure you exit out of the game all the way. I'm not sure when KSP decides to write this particular setting to the config files, but maybe if you are just clicking X or ALT+F-4 to exit...

~Claw

Edited October 8, 2014 by Claw
I can confirm this, x64 Linux, exiting the game through the expected means (in-game menu traversal). The angle snap always reverts to no-snap instead of respecting the previous choice.
